Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.animatedblock

@NonNullByDefault package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.animatedblock
This package contains various interfaces and classes used to define animated blocks.

An IAnimatedBlock represents a part of a structure while it is being animated. Before and after the animation, these will be regular blocks.

The AnimatedHighlightedBlock class represents a specific type of animated block. These preview blocks are used to create an animation showing what the animation would look like, without modifying the structure itself.

External plugins have two ways of interacting with the animations:

  • IAnimatedBlockHook:

    The animated block hook allows hooking into each animated block in an animation.

    The hook interface allows overriding methods to react to events of the block, such as (re)spawning, moving, ticking, etc.

  • IAnimationHook:

    Animation hooks allow hooking into the animation itself.

    Like with the animated block hook, the animation hook interface allows overriding methods to react to events. Events for the animation hook include the start and end of the animation, every animation step, and more.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api
    This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, highlighted block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.debugging
    This package contains classes and interfaces used for debugging.
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.factories
    This package contains various factories for creating objects used in the project.
    nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.restartable
    Contains classes and interfaces used to easily restart objects.
